long_description: With a 15 cu. ft. capacity, this economical car-top carrier lets you to take along almost everything! Constructed from 16-oz. UV- and cold-resistant vinyl; features tough radio-frequency welded seams to eliminate needle hole leaks. Rugged, two-way #10 zippers accommodate locks; deeply recessed zipper and vinyl storm flap seal out water. Lateral compression straps helps secure your load. Features heavy-duty hardware and accessories. Universal Attachment kit completesthis super-tough, super weather fighting carrier and make it the great value that it is. Sherpak can be quickly detached from the rack or car top and easily, folded and stored when not in use; takes up just one cubic foot of space.
short_description: With a 15 cu. ft. capacity, this economical car-top carrier lets you to take along almost everything!
